abstract.t: This document defines the concept of an "origin", which represents aweb principal. Typically, user agents isolate content retrieved fromdifferent origins to prevent a malicious web site operator frominterfering with the operation of benign web sites. In particular,this document defines how to compute an origin from a URI, how toserialize an origin to a string, and an HTTP header, named "Origin",for indicating which origin caused the user agent to issue aparticular HTTP request.
